articles.author: Amanda Seitz, Michelle L. Price
articles.title: RFK Jr.'s MAHA report raises concerns about vaccines, American foods and prescription drugs - AP News
articles.description: A new government-issued report reflects some of the most controversial views on vaccines, the nation’s food supply, pesticides and prescription drugs held by Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. The much-anticipated “Make America Healthy …
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) A government report released on Thursday covering wide swaths of American health and wellness reflects some of the most contentious views on vaccines, the nations food supply, pestici… [+7256 chars]
